transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Mam Chetna baat kar rahe ho?
Executive: Haan mam bataiye uska call kaat do.
Customer: Main keh rahi achcha mujhe laga wo aap ho. Unhone call kaata hai. Main keh rahi thi ki mera discussion hua mam ke sath unhone bola ki wo sir ko already clear kar chuki hai ki IndiaMART ke side se unke paas mail gaya tha ki aapka jo voucher hai wo I think December tak valid hai. Wo keh rahi thi ki hum aur aapke paas koi bhi evidence nahi hai evidence in the sense ki aapke paas koi bhi mail nahi hai Akshita mam ke side se.
Hmm, hello.
Customer: Haan wo keh rahe the ki aapke paas koi mail nahi hai Akshita mam ke side se jahan par aap bol sake ki unhone ye written me diya tha ki aapka jo ye jo cashback hai wo unlimited time tak ke liye valid hai.
Customer: Wo to galti hui na mam humse wahi galti hui hai humse. Mam humne to sir to decision le hi rahe hain wo to bol rahe hain aap sari services hamari band kar do nahi chalayenge hum IndiaMART koi issue nahi hai. Payment bhi aap sara return karwa dijiyega jo bhi kiya hua hai. Unhone to yahi decision liya hai fir.
Executive: Achcha ye decision abhi liya sir ne?
Customer: Haan mujhe kal hi bol diya tha unhone ki agar wo cashback nahi karte hain adjust aage wale package me to koi baat nahi IndiaMART band kar do nahi chalayenge IndiaMART. Kyunki hum log agar itne time se business kar rahe hain aapke sath aur itna bada bada teen teen saal ka package hum hamesha har baar le lete hain. To fir agar aap log itni si baat bhi hamari nahi maan pa rahe ho to fir kaise kaam kar payenge madam. Mam payment bhi do baar me hamari puri ho jati hai aur package bhi hum per year ka nahi per third year ka lete hain mam. Aur us time unhone humse verbally kaha tha wo hamari galti hai ki humne unse mail nahi liya. Sir ka kehna hai yahi hai.
Executive: Ab mujhe ek cheez bataiye unko baat kyunki wo yaad rehna thoda sa [unintelligible].
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji, ek kuch cheez bataiyega IndiaMART, theek hai main keh rahi hu Akshita mam ne aap se kuch bhi kaha ho, theek hai but proper IndiaMART ke side se aapko mail gaya hai is cheez ka cashback ka aapko mail gaya hai.
Customer: Madam hum log aap pe trust karte hain na to hum log aap se deal karte hain aap pe trust karke sari cheeze payment wagera sab kar dete hain. Ab uske baad agar aap direct company se mail kare ya jo bhi kare hamari verbally jo baat hoti hai hum us pe rehte hain baki wo to galti hai main maan rahi hu ki humne mail unse nahi liya tha us time aur mere ko pata bhi nahi tha ki cashback humko lena hai return wo to aapne mujhe bataya to maine sir se discuss kiya to unhone mujhe bola ki jo next package rahega usme adjust karwana hai. To maine bola theek hai fir maine aap se do teen baar kaha par aapne kaha ki next package hamara April, May, June tak ka hai then aap usme adjust nahi kar paoge hamara last cashback ka date jo hai wo December tak ka hai.
Uske baad unhone Akshita mam se baat kari to unhone unko bahut sari cheeze clear kari ki hamare aur bhi expenses hai hamara naye factory ka bhi kuch kaam hai hum uske liye bhi aapko package lenge.
Executive: Akshita mam se baat hui hai aapki?
Customer: Sir ki hui thi.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Tab mam ne yu kaha tha ki aap teen mahine pehle package le lo humne puri koshish kari abhi 10 din se hum usme lage hue the ki hum three months pehle agar package lenge to hum puri proper uski tayari kar le amount hum log aisa kar le adjust par wo nahi ho pa raha hai. To kal bhi mujhe sir ne yahi kaha tha ki madam aap unko bol dena ki cashback humko udhar hi hum adjust kar payenge next jo bhi hum package lenge usme. Fir wo bhale hi December ke baad ka ho teen mahine baad ka ho ya che mahine baad ka ho kyunki unhone verbally pehle unse wo baat kari thi tabhi humne deal enclose kari thi warna hum ye package bhi nahi lete mam.
Ab wo Akshita mam ki galti hai na ya to unko us time bolna nahi chahiye tha sir ko kyunki package to sir hi kharidte hain mam main to sirf services aur kuch problem aati hai.
Executive: Ab wahi cheez hai na mam ab aapne jo package liya wo Akshita mam se liya, theek hai aur kahin na kahin ab aapki jo services handle kar rahi hai wo main kar rahi hu.
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Ab maine to kyunki pata hai kya aap sir se ek bari meri baat hui thi to sir ne mujhe kaha tha ki hamara cashback pada hua hai jo ki hum aane wali services me usko extend karenge renewal ke time pe use karenge. Tabhi maine sir ko bola ki sir aapka jo cashback hai wo pehle khatm hoga aur services ka renewal aapka baad me aayega. To wo bole ki nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai aur hamari baat ho chuki hai Akshita se aap Akshita se baat kijiye. To maine Akshita se matlab se bhi confirm kiye baat to unhone kaha bola ki nahi mere aapke sath discussion hua tha sir ke sath discussion hua tha to maine unko bol diya tha ki che mahine tak ke liye hi valid rehta hai aise karke. To ab dikkat ye hai na ab dekhiye maine aapko kyun bola cashback ke liye ki aap confirmation le lijiye kyunki hai na main nahi chahti in future in future ye ho jata ki mam ye cheez hamare ki hamare knowledge me bhi cheeze nahi thi. Theek hai in fact maine aapko screenshot bhi share kare jaise aapka yahan se renewal sorry aapka cashback generate hua aapke paas proper primary mail id pe mail gaya tha ki ye cashback yahan se yahan tak valid hai. Dusra matlab dusri mistake ye hui hai ki wo bhi.
Customer: Haan mam wo ho gayi hai ab us pe baat bar bar baat karne se koi fayda nahi hai aap to Akshita madam se last verdict le lo agar wo mante hain aage extend karne ke liye to theek hai nahi to aap hamare sare package cancel kar do sara payment return kar do. Hum nahi chalayenge IndiaMART.
Executive: Suniye Akshita mam meri baat suniye Akshita mam manager hai but ye jo ye hota hai na IndiaMART ke jo norms hai wo IndiaMART ka management decide karta hai wo ek manager hai unke hath me koi bhi IndiaMART ki policy nahi hai ki wo change kar sake.
Customer: Mam aap unse last puch lo na warna wo to aap sir cancel karne ka hi bol rahe hain main ab unko kuch bol bhi nahi paungi kyunki last unhone mujhe bol diya.
Executive: Unko puchne ki mujhe is cheez me nahi nahi nahi mujhe is cheez me ki zarurat nahi hai kyunki mujhe pata hai mam aaj tak ki date me in fact mere khud ke client bhi wo thoda matlab sirf do din ke liye unko extend karwana tha kyunki wo matlab ek na unka tournament tha wo tournament me busy ho gayi. Unhe do din ke liye unka cashback extend karwana tha wo do din bhi unka cashback extend nahi hua aur wo wahan se direct expire ho gaya. Sirf do din ki aapki cheez bata rahi hu main aapko sirf do din me wo mujhe boli mam tournament me busy hu bas do din ke liye isko hold kar lijiye kyunki wo jaise aapka invoice create hota hai aur jaise aapki ye pura systematic cheeze chalti hai system karta hai wo. System ne generate kiya system ne expire kar diya.
Customer: Mam unko nahi bolna chahiye tha na madam ko us time nahi bolna chahiye tha na aap sir ke mind me wo baat baith gayi hai wo nikal thodi payenge hum log us time nahi bolna chahiye tha. Kyun bola unhone aisa ki hum cashback aage wali services me extend kar denge nahi bolna chahiye tha.
Executive: Mam.
Customer: Ab kahin na kahin agar aap December me bhi lete hain aap logon ke sath main maan rahi hu aapki galti nahi hai par aapke jo upar hai unhone kyun bola ab aap khud socho jab itni sari cheeze unko mind me hai pura verdict bata rahe hain wo ki mam ne bola tha ki ye cashback jo rahega aapko jo cashback mil raha hai wo aage wali serviceo me aap extend kar lena to sir ne bola tha theek hai tabhi us bihaf pe hi unhone payment kiya tha otherwise wo package kharidte hi nahi mam.
Ab mam wo baat hai ki ab wo to bilkul mana hi kar rahe hain mujhe ki tu to sari IndiaMART band kar de.
Executive: Maine aapki meri koi zarurat hi nahi hai.
Executive: Maine aapki jo sari jo bhi mujhe issues bola maine apne higher management me bhi sari cheeze rakhi wahan se bhi ye feedback aaya ki humne to proper mail kiya tha na aapko to kahin na kahin aapke bihaf par bhi aapne.
Customer: Hum log hum itna trust karke abhi kya hai ki hum log itna trust karke sir ne verbally unki baat maan li thi kyunki humko aaj se pehle kabhi IndiaMART se itna bada problem hua nahi hai hum log 10 saal se kam se kam kar rahe hain aur hamesha teen saal ka ek baar ek baar me hi payment karte hain mam wo bhi thoda dekhna chahiye na agar unko nahi dena tha agar aisa tha ki December tak hi hai to unko us time sir ko bol dena tha ki sir aap December tak is cashback ka kuch bhi purchase kar lijiyega ab wo nahi ho raha hai to main bhi kya kar sakti hu main thodi bol sakti hu mam unhone unka decision mere ko last verdict de diya hai ki agar wo adjust karte hain aage extend to theek hai nahi to hum baat bhi nahi karenge aur hamari sari services close kar dena aap jo bhi payment hai wo aap return kar dena. Nahi chalayenge.
Executive: Mam ek bari kaam kariyega main mam ko bol dungi wo aapko call kar lenge theek hai aap sir se boliyega baat kar lenge.
Customer: Haan theek hai aisa kar lijiye. Kyunki mujhe to wo clearly clearly wo mujhe mana kar chuki thi sir se bhi mujhe bhi manager ne mana kar diya jaise aapko Akshita madam ne mana kara hai na.
Executive: Nahi nahi Akshita mam ne nahi Akshita mam ne nahi ki mere ko IndiaMART se koi matlab hi nahi hai agar wo cashback extend karte hain to theek hai nahi to sari services band kar do nahi chalayenge IndiaMART.
Customer: Ab main abhi kaise bolu mam main bhi employee hu jaise aap ho jaise aap bol rahe ho waise aap mere ko bhi rakh ke dekho.
Executive: Haan to mujhe Akshita mam ne nahi bola kyunki wo meri manager nahi hai theek hai mujhe jo bola wo jo mere senior manager hai Renu mam I think unse baat bhi hui hogi sir ki unhone bola ki management ka ye matlab management hi sari cheeze decide karti hai theek hai na aur ye jo hota hai aapka cashback hota hai invoice hota hai wo systematic generate hota hai. To isme hum nahi kuch manually hum kuch nahi kar sakte sari cheeze hai na systematically aur automatic hoti hai.
Customer: Baki main mam ko bol dungi ek bari sir se baat kar lenge theek hai na aap unko bol do kyunki December me bhi zyada time nahi hai jitna delay hoga utna ulajh me jayenge ek bari ye problem solve hogi to.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai na koi issue nahi hai services aapki hai decision aapka hai aur dusra cheez ki maine unke sath sari cheeze share ki to unhone mujhe last yahi bola ki Chetna humne written me proper mail kiya ab theek hai verbally aap humne mail kyun kiya kyunki aage jaake cheeze fase na mam but theek hai agar usi cheez pe baatein aa rahi hai to main mam ko bol dungi wo ek bari sir se discussion kar lenge theek hai.
Customer: Haan bol dijiye call karne ke liye wahi discussion.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai mam.
Executive: Okay mam thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants cashback adjusted in next package.

- Customer threatens to cancel IndiaMART subscription.

- Customer states verbal commitment not honored.



Resolution:

- Executive will ask manager to call customer.

- Executive explained IndiaMART policy is management-driven.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will ask manager to call customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, cashback, subscription, management
